thread.section_title: Summer In Italy Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Summer In Italy | www.summerinitaly.com
thread.title: Sara Jelenazza
thread.title_full: Summer In Italy reviewed by Sara Jelenazza

author: Sara Jelenazza
title: Sara Jelenazza
text: After searching for accommodation over several days, I got in touch with Anita who was most helpful with my reservation and questions. When she was out of the office, others tended to her emails and assisted. This has been refreshing and I would recommend their services anytime.
